name: 10 Second Ginger Demo
description:
10 Second Ginger is a 2D speed-based platformer in which every level needs to be beaten in 10 seconds

Controls:

D or → = right

A or ← = Left

s or ↓ = crawl

w or ↑ = climb

space = jump

x = dash

Note:

This is a very early build of the game and only a demo, I am continuing development constantly and will be releasing the full game (eventually) when it is finished with a lot of features still to come!

email ashbatey2005@gmail.com if you have any questions or bugs or visit My Website to see more projects
